availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward Remington Ames (Marion County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, printer. Kentucky native. Son of Orson Ames and Martha Ann Bell Ames. Married to Susan M. Smock Ames in Marion County in 1862. Father of Charles Ames. Resident of Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Printer in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States(1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States(1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 547.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Floyd County, New Albany Ward 3, p. 312A.
"Married Sixty Years," The Chattanooga News (Chattanooga, TN), May 29, 1922, p. 6.
"Funeral Services for E.R. Ames Set Wednesday," The Chattanooga News (Chattanooga, TN), January 19, 1932, p. 6.
